snippet: U.S.-backed Iraqi forces on Monday captured Mosul's al-Hurriya bridge, which leads to the Islamic State-held old city center from the south, a military media officer told Reuters....

headline.main: Oil Edges Up After Iraq Urges Extension of OPEC Cuts
headline.print_headline: Oil Edges Up After Iraq Urges Extension of OPEC Cuts

lead_paragraph: U.S.-backed Iraqi forces on Monday captured Mosul's al-Hurriya bridge, which leads to the Islamic State-held old city center from the south, a military media officer told Reuters.
